summary: Mirko and Stefan, Serbian refugees, move to the French Riviera. There they meet Maguy who lives in a luxurious mansion up the hill above Cannes with an odd group of friends.
cast: Nathalie Baye|Roschdy Zem|Ludivine Sagnier|Mylène Demongeot|Radivoje Bukvic|Xavier de Guillebon|Caroline Ducey|Antoine Bibiloni|Radha Valli|Soria Moufakkir|Ridouane Yazit|Mirko Stanic|Bojan Kolak|Sanja Filipovic|Marko Bocereg|Romina Riggi|Carole Bouvier|Geoffrey Lecerf|Amadou Sene|Francisco Pizarro Saenz de Urtury|Martine Pujol|Zoran Modrakovic|Rany Otmanetelba|Agathe Lacroix
title: La Californie
